titles.title: Supporting the efforts of the Republic of Turkey to join the European Union.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 10/16/2002--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the United States should continue to support the efforts of Turkey to join the European Union; and (2) the European Union should recognize Turkey's comprehensive political and economic reforms and set a date for the initiation of accession negotiations at the December 12-13, 2002, meeting of the European Council in Copenhagen.
